issue_comments.body:
I deleted the Kiwipedia Hibs in ZeroHello, reloaded Kiwipedia and clicked on the en Hub. Still same error message:

 Internal error: Exception: Merger site (Kiwipedia) does not have permission for merged site: 17FjMvAGAWAHxUohzk5HEq5EgjoCXnXV19 (None)
UiWebsocket.py line 217 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 150 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 127 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 40
found it: where to upload it?
Ah. I deleted the hub again and now I don't get an error any more. :-)  Thx for fixing it.

It would be super seamless if it would trigger an autodownload when visiting an unknown page like:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/wiki/en/additive-map

please please :-)
thank you! It's great work so far!
I will try it.  The bug appears when I type the title and then click, "Import from Wikipedia" (so it gets the link from the title.)

I tried importing the article again and get the message

> This article has other imported version(s) you may want to look at. Choose between https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/tensor product . 

I think differentiating between upper and lower case is confusing...   not super important but would be nice....

I have the same problem with this article
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/imported/en/https-en-wikipedia-org-wiki-complex-number/complex-number

It is necessary to import the title from wikipedia regardless if a title is given or not. Otherwise there will be so many confusing copies with title typesetting  differences.......

issues.title: Search and Import article feature on homepage
issues.body:
Currently I have to click: Hub list --> en --> Article index --> search for article.
A Search and Import article feature on the homepage would be great.

issues.title: Always import Wiki title typesetting
issues.body:
By accident I imported an article with lower case:  http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/imported/en/https-en-wikipedia-org-wiki-tensor-product/tensor-product

The exact spelling should always be copied from wikipedia.


PS: Could you delete the article that i can reimport it with correct uppercase of the first letter?

issues.title: Import all linked articles
issues.body:
If I visit a kiwipedia webpage there are usually links to other wikipedia pages referenced in it (and most of them need to be imported). A button: "Import all linked articles" would be great.

PS: Even more advanced would be a recursive script importing also the links of all links.

issues.title: Import doesn' work for underscore articles
issues.body:
When I try to import the article  
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultural_Revolution

It actually imports the article 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultural-Revolution
which is  a redirect to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cultural_Revolution

Therefore the real article cannot be imported.

issues.title: Incorrect Formula
issues.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1KiwiBCVBUcuypVm8FEmUW9YT6fJDXkN9r/?/imported/en/https-en-wikipedia-org-wiki-cumulant/cumulant
Contains many of the errors "Incorrect Formula"
